ygData.subject: Re: Mesh or Woven gloves damage
ygData.msgSnippet: what determines how hard you hit is your atk and your str....your str raises your attack, so they go hand in hand ( /)ystix Spellchaser lv 46 human cleric of
ygData.messageBody:
what determines how hard you hit is your atk and your str....your str raises
your attack, so they go hand in hand

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 46 human cleric of The Rathe
